The movie tells the story of a wealthy young woman named Rose DeWitt who comes from an upper class background and falls in love with a poor artist named Jack Dawson who comes from a working class background and also has been struggling financially as well?
Despite being born from different social backgrounds, they end up falling in love with each other.
However, just like in our world today, despite having fallen in love with each other, they end up getting separated while following a black van.
Three of them stop in an alley so that Jack can relieve Rose.
However, their friends who were also following the black van are forced into the lost black van by two druges.
The other car of their friends who were also following the black van is informed by the kidnappers that if they want to see them again they have to do exactly what they say.
It is revealed that the kidnappers are a modern day Jack the Ripper duo, stalking the streets, picking up prostitutes whom they murder and mutilate.

These killer/kidnappers alarmed for being followed, frame these guys. It is the mission of the remaining friends to dispose of the body to retrieve their friends.
